entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
